amendment.description: To provide an additional $500 million to enhance the ability of the Internal Revenue Service to collect taxes owed but not paid voluntarily.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3170 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3170 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Conrad. (consideration: CR S2273-2274; text: CR S2273-2274) To provide an additional $500 million to enhance the ability of the Internal Revenue Service to collect taxes owed but not paid voluntarily.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3170 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3170 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Conrad.
